# Bleed (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]]

**Level:** [[0 Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 0]], [[0 Level Inquisitor Spells|Inquisitor 0]], [[0 Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 0]], [[0 Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 0]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One living creature

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 249

You cause a living creature that is below 0 hit points but stabilized to resume [[Dying|dying]]. Upon casting this spell, you target a living creature that has â€“1 or fewer hit points. That creature begins [[Dying|dying]], taking 1 point of damage per round. The creature can be stabilized later normally. This spell causes a creature that is [[Dying|dying]] to take 1 point of damage.
